meanings.definition: In a manner that relates to or is characteristic of solipsism.
meanings.sent1: She solipsistically believed that only her thoughts were real.
meanings.sent2: He solipsistically viewed the world as a projection of his mind.
meanings.sent3: The cat solipsistically thought the entire house revolved around her.
meanings.sent4: The artist solipsistically painted a world where only his imagination existed.
meanings.sent5: The child solipsistically imagined a universe where only their toys had life.

meanings.definition: In a self-centered or egocentric manner.
meanings.sent1: He solipsistically talked about himself without considering others.
meanings.sent2: She solipsistically believed she was the center of everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The actor solipsistically thought the movie was all about their performance.
meanings.sent4: The politician solipsistically saw themselves as the only solution to all problems.
meanings.sent5: The teenager solipsistically assumed everyone was talking about them behind their back.
